title: The Best Pricing In The Bellevue Area Is @ The Regent!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'APPLY NOW: <URL>', 'WEBSITE: <URL>/', 'Enjoy comfort and convenience at The Regent at Bellevue Way!', 'Our warm and inviting pet friendly apartment community is located in Bellevue, Washington.', 'Have the convenience of being in close proximity to everything with easy access to shopping, restaurants, schools, parks and entertainment, without living in the middle of the city.', "From the moment you arrive you'll feel right at home.", 'Choose from our one, two and three bedroom floor plans, uniquely designed with the amenities that you deserve!', 'Some of our apartment features include plush carpeting, patio or balcony, walk-in closets, window coverings, vaulted ceilings in select units, as well as ceiling fans and for added convenience a washer and dryer in each unit.', 'Our residents are offered some of the best community amenities available in apartment living.', 'You will appreciate our swimming pool/sauna, fitness center, easy access to public transportation and freeways.', 'As well as garages, disability access and business center onsite for added convenience.', 'Come and see why The Regent at Bellevue is the picture-perfect place to call your next home!', 'We are currently allowing self guided tours!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Maximum of 2 pets per home.', 'Weight maximum of 50 pounds.$250 refundable pet deposit per pet.$250 one time pet fee per pet.', '$50 dog rent per month, $35 cat rent per month.', 'Deposit:', '$300 refundable, $300 non-refundable', 'Leasing options:', 'Month to month None,3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Advertised pricing is based on a 12 month lease term and immediate move in.', 'Pricing variable based on lease term and move in date.', 'Application fee:', '$44 per adult applicant', 'Amenities', 'Included in
